casebody.data:
The HOOVER COMPANY, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. VACUUM CLEANER EXPERTS, Inc., and Hyman Berenson, also Known as H. Berry, Defendants-Appellants. No. 458. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. June 22, 1936. Harry Meisel, of New York City, for appellants. Oscar W. Jeffery, of New York City (Reginald Hicks, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Orders affirmed.
